net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dndb_RollExpression_getHigherLevelDie
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Extracts the atHigherLevel information from the spell and builds the corresponding dice object based on the expended spellslot or the character level.
arg (0) = BasicSpell arg (1) = spellSlot level
returns modified dice object, which includes the scaleType:
{ "scaleType": "spellscale", "diceCount": "3", "diceValue": "10", "fixedValue": "0" }
For spellscalelevel (like Fireball), the return dice object is the additional dice added to the original roll. For characterlevel (like Fire Bolt), the return object replaces the original.
